content: my simple beanie pattern is a great option to practice working in-the-round for those new to crochet or one who hasn t crocheted for some time it also comes in handy when you need a project that works up quickly such as for a last minute gift this pattern size is adaptable once you are aware the circumference needed the only materials needed are an i hook pending your gauge your choice of worsted yarn a stitch marker and tapestry needle stitches used are us chain single_crochet and double_crochet happy crochet mae p s this is my first pattern if anyone has any feedback or sees an error please let me know i had a few look over it but no one to test thanks *personal note this pattern was created by my improvising many hat patterns over the years i ve shared the pattern and image freely however strongly discourage either to be used or sold as one s own work please msg me if you have any questions *
